title: Council Decision of 23 February 1998 on the replacement of members of the European Social Fund Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 February 1998 on the replacement of members of the European Social Fund Committee (98/C 77/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members of the European Social Fund Committee for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 22 October 1998:
>TABLE>
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done in Brussels, 23 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 374, 31.12.1988, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 3193/94 (OJ L 337, 24.12.1994, p. 11).
(2) OJ C 296, 10.11.1995, p. 7.
